data.title: NCT 127 4TH TOUR 'NEO CITY : MACAU - THE MOMENTUM'
data.description:
NCT 127是韓國SM娛樂有限公司於2016年7月7日推出的男子演唱組合，是NCT組合的第二支小分隊。隊名中的“127”代表了韓國首爾的經度，表達了組合要將K-POP從韓國帶向全世界的抱負。

NCT 127將於2025年初展開他們的第四次世界巡迴演唱會，本次巡演將從首爾拉開序幕，隨後在亞洲和美州等地開唱。其中，澳門站將在4月26日及27日在銀河綜藝館舉行。

各位NCTzen粉絲們，敬請期待！


NCT 127 is a male idol group formed by SM Entertainment on July 7, 2016, which is the second sub-group of the group NCT. The “127” in the group’s name represents the longitude of Seoul, South Korea, and symbolizes their ambition, promoting K-POP from Korea to the world.

NCT 127’s fourth world tour will kick off in Seoul in January 2025, followed by cities in Asia, the United States and more. NCT 127 4TH TOUR 'NEO CITY : MACAU - THE MOMENTUM' will take place on April 26-27, 2025 at the Galaxy Arena.

NCTzens, are you ready?


演出日期 Date & Time：2025.04.26 (SAT) 7PM & 2025.04.27 (SUN) 6PM

（實際演出時間以現場狀況為準 Actual performance time based on on-site situation）

演出地點 Venue：澳門銀河綜藝館 GALAXY ARENA


公售時間：2024年12月28日（星期六）中午12時

General Onsale: December 28th (SAT) at 12PM (CST)


票價

-NEO CITY PACAKAGE MOP 2199

*STANDING * 1 (INCLUDE SOUND CHECK PARTY)

*POST CARD SET (MACAU EXCLUSIVE/ Day 1 & Day 2 are different photos)


-PLATINUM SEATED MOP 1,999

-CAT 1 SEATED MOP 1,699

-CAT 2 SEATED MOP 1,399

-CAT 3 SEATED MOP 999

-CAT 4 SEATED MOP 699

-RESTRICTED VIEW ZONE



*座位區皆為劃位座席，請依票面座位號入座

Each SEATED ticket is assigned a specific seat.

*站區票面有序號，請依票面序號排整隊入場。人身安全起見，孕婦及身高未滿140公分或未滿12歲孩童，請勿購買站區票券，主辦方將有權謝絕入場

STANDING entry is with queue number. For safety reasons, pregnant women and children under 140 cm or 12 years old are not allowed to enter STANDING area.

*NCTzen 127 MEMBERSHIP會員預購每筆ID每場限購2張票券，公開售票每人每交易限購4張票券。若經核對發現同一會員ID購票數超過2張，主辦單位有權取消該票券交易。

Purchase limit is 2 tickets per show for NCTzen 127 MEMBERSHIP Presale and 4 tickets per show per account for General Onsale. If more than 2 tickets are purchased with the same member ID after verification, the organizer has the right to cancel the ticket transaction.

*Restricted View指視線受阻座位，有機會未能看到完整舞台

You may be unable to see the entire stage from the Restricted view seats.

*本次活動採用動態電子門票，入場時需登入 Fantopia 帳戶並出示電子門票二維碼。紙質打印或截圖的電子門票二維碼將無法入場

This event uses dynamic electronic tickets. You must log in to your Fantopia account and show the electronic ticket QR code when entering. Paper printouts or screenshots of the electronic ticket QR code will not be accepted for entry.

*售出門票不設退換

We do not offer returns or exchanges.

eventsEntity.entityAdress: RM 413,4/F LUCKY CTR 165-171WAN CHAI RD WAN CHAI HK
